title: Should we buy and burn STBZ with treasury funds
body:
It would immediately help the price of STBZ if the funds in the treasury get sold weekly to buy STBZ from the ETH/STBZ pool; and to burn the bougt STBZ. 
This would give an instant and consistent support for the STBZ price and have a deflationary effect.
This would have clear advantages compared with the existing method of hoarding the funds for a later burn in the far future, since this hoarding method just creats a price floor, but no real price support at this early stage since the funds are basically locked and un-used untill the STBZ m-cap is similar to the treasury value.
choices: Yes, please frequently buy and burn STBZ with treasury funds
NO, leave it like it is
author: 0x63Dbf00C99EaD0635FF5aDf2fd2f1F7F2141fc7C
